items.item_text: 6:00 p.m. - Call Meeting to Order at the District Board Room, 4750 San Felipe Road, San Jose, CA 95134
items.item_text_raw: 1. 6:00 p.m. - Call Meeting to Order at the District Board Room, 4750 San Felipe Road, San Jose, CA 95134

items.item_details:
The Board of Trustees offers an opportunity for the public to address the Board in two sections of this agenda: on matters not appearing on the agenda; and prior to voting on the item contained in the Action Agenda. Each speaker is encouraged to submit a comment card to the Board clerk in order to be recognized to speak.
	Per Board Policy, three minutes may be allotted to each speaker with a maximum of 30 minutes per subject. No action or discussion shall be undertaken on any public comments except that members of the Board or its staff may briefly respond to or ask a question for clarification regarding statements made or questions posed by persons addressing the Board under this agenda item.
	For information and disability access to materials, call 408-270-6402. Meetings are held in a location accessible to the disabled.
items.item_text: Information on Public Comments and Disability Access
items.item_text_raw: 2. Information on Public Comments and Disability Access

items.item_details:
a. Additions/Deletions/Corrections
	b. Items to be Deferred
	c. Adoption of Agenda
	The Board reserves the right to modify the order of business in the manner it deems appropriate.

Newly elected Trustees Scott Hung Pham, Trustee Area 2; Huong H. Nguyen, Trustee Area 4; and Dr. Jeffrey B. Lease, Trustee Area 6, will be administered the Oath of Office.
	Â 
A reception will follow in the Board Room.

items.item_details: This is an opportunity for members of the public to address the Board concerning issues not listed on the agenda.
items.item_text: Public Comments on Matters not on the Agenda
items.item_text_raw: 6. Public Comments on Matters not on the Agenda

items.item_details: Pursuant to Elections Code Section 15400, the Governing Board should accept the Statement of Votes and Certificate of Election Results, and declare the totals to be the final results of the election. The election results include Trustee Areas 2, 4 and 6.
items.item_recommendation: A recommendation that the Board of Trustees accept the Statement of Votes and Certificate of Election Results of the November 4, 2014, Election.
items.item_text: Acceptance of the Statement of Votes and Certificate of Election Results of the November 4, 2014, Election
